Title: Provides that historical motor vehicles need only pay a registration fee upon initial registration and no further fee until sold or otherwise transferred
Summary: Provides that historical motor vehicles need only pay a registration fee upon initial registration and no registration renewal or further fee shall be required until sold or otherwise transferred; raises such fee from $28 to $100.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permanent registration of historical motor vehicles
